text: pasuva apage vahalungen api tora gat ayava ema dharmayanta himi aya bavata pat kalemu. ehet ovungen samaharek (eyata venaskam kara), tamanta tamanma haniyak kara gatha. ovungen (venat) samaharek madhyastha margayehi gaman gatha. ovungen (tavat) samaharek nam, allahge niyogayanta anuva dÃ¦hÃ¦mi karanavanhi idiriyenma sitinnaha. eyama ati visala bhagyayak vanneya
